The '''Mondstadt Wine Guild''', also known as the '''Mondstadt Wine Appreciation Guild''', is an organization in Mondstadt.

[[Elzer]] became the executive chair of the Guild some time after becoming responsible for the affairs of Dawn Winery (after [[Crepus]] died).<ref>{{Ref/NPC|Elzer}}</ref>

==Members==
* [[Elzer]] &mdash; Executive Chairman
